p: All solvents for fatty-acid extraction were high-performance liquid chromatography grade. Methanol (MeOH), benzene, n-heptane, 2,2-dimethoxypropane (DMP), and sulfuric acid (H 2SO 4) were purchased from Fisher Scientific Korea Ltd. (Seoul, Korea), Junsei Chemical Co. (Tokyo, Japan) or Daejung Chemical & Materials Co. (Gyeonggi-Do, Korea). The 37-component fatty-acid methyl ester (FAME, CRM47885) standard mixture and pentadecanoic acid (P6125) were used as internal standards, and were produced by Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA).
